name: JUMP AND RUN - DON'T FALL
description: JUMP AND RUN - DON'T FALL is a simple but challenging First-Person platformer .
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 805 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9800 GTX DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
